General.Name: Cho Thavee Public Company Limited
General.Description: Cho Thavee Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and assembles commercial automotive engineering systems. The company offers dump and 4 axles full trailers; refrigerated fiberglass body; dump, mobile lab, fiber refrigerator, and dry van trucks; and 3 axles and car carrier semi-trailers. It also provides ground support equipment, such as aircraft, maintenance platform, and 53 meter ladder trucks; semi-trailer 7 Axles; mobile advertising trucks; lowbed 3 axles and 16 axles semi-trailers; catering trucks; and rail systems, as well as project management services. The company was formerly known as Cho Thavee Dollasien Public Company Limited and changed its name to Cho Thavee Public Company Limited in May 2016. Cho Thavee Public Company Limited was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Khon Kaen, Thailand.
